com.example.felix.notizen.BackEnd.JsonManager

Class cJsonManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.felix.notizen.BackEnd.JsonManager.cJsonManager

  • public class cJsonManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for JSON file containing all data saved in this application. JSON file shall look like template Used as singleton

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String aJSON_FILE_LOCATION
      Location of JSON file To be set at construction of JSON_READER

      singleton instance

      • read_JSON

        public void read_JSON()
               throws cJsonManagerException
        read JSON file does not return anything, as read instances are saved at runtime into runtime data manager
        Throws:
        cJsonManagerException - in case something goes wrong reading the data
